turns.text: -- like you I havent done any in quite some time --
-- except for what I call living now --
-- which is which is very close to camping
Yeah You know I uh camped in the Boy Scouts and you know my dad and I went out sometimes but --
turns.label: ny

turns.text: -- uh even my first uh eight or nine years of working I camped almost all of the time because I was in construction
And it is cheaper to pitch tent and cook your meals out by the fire than it is to rent an apartment --
turns.label: sd

turns.text: -- add to stress I mean when you have to have it you have got to have it
And you know in those those kinds of situations uh room rent which is outrageous -
turns.label: sv

turns.text: So my buddy and I we just camped
turns.label: sd

turns.text: And we figured what the hell we did it when we were kids and we loved it
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Of course we didnt really rough it that much When when I was in high school - he is couple years older than me and uh he graduated and went off to college and uh during the summer we would camp out at the lake
turns.label: sd

turns.text: But it wasnt very much like camping because we had refrigerator and stove
turns.label: sd

turns.text: You know I had little boat house and floated it out on Lake Grapevine
turns.label: sd

turns.text: And uh well it was fantastic We would get up in the morning go skiing uh that substituted for shower --
turns.label: sd

turns.text: -- and then we would go to work and uh come back to the uh you know boat house at night and uh in the afternoon you know it is still four oclock You have got four hours of day light good skiing left
turns.label: sd

turns.text: But uh you know now all my life is more like camping than not camping really
turns.label: sd

turns.text: uh-huh Do you have electricity out there
turns.label: b

turns.text: Well actually as matter of fact they just ran the phone three years ago
turns.label: aap

turns.text: They didnt have phone lines You just couldnt get phones
turns.label: sd

turns.text: And uh we are on the we are third from the end on the electric string
turns.label: sd

turns.text: So we are at the end of the mail route
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Like I said we are probably as far as you can get from the Seven Eleven and still be in Texas
turns.label: sv

turns.text: But uh you know right now uh what we did my wife and I is we got mobile home
turns.label: sd

turns.text: One of these twelve by forty-eights that got repoed
And uh swapped them Cadillac for it and put it out here on the land figuring I would build house some day you know

Im in construction and uh you know I just had this place you know to shower up while I was you know out here you know putting up fence and building driveway and drilling well and all that stuff you have to do before you can even put house in you know
turns.label: sd

turns.text: And uh I came home from work one Friday afternoon and our truck was back Everything we had was in boxes and my wife said uh were moving
turns.label: sd

turns.text: And I said where And she said out to the trailer And I said oh She said yep and I said okay
turns.label: sd(^q)

turns.text: So we have been roughing it out here for about three years but it is not bad I we have color microwave you know --
turns.label: sd

turns.text: -- it is not horrible but its its lot like camping
turns.label: sd

turns.text: uh-huh Yeah well I grew up in California in southe- --
turns.label: b

turns.text: -- right in the valley So it is forty-five minute drive to the mountains and uh so my dad loved fishing and camping So we would go up First we went up just to uh with Toyota pick up truck and laid out our sleeping bags under the stars and you know cooked our uh hot dogs by the fire or whatever
But then later my mom and dad got camper so uh --
turns.label: sd

turns.text: -- we have kind of moved up Yeah little bit in the world
Yeah my mom goes camping you know She takes her uh motor home You know shes got one of these huge Winnebagos with refrigerator and air-conditioning color microwave oven --
turns.label: b

turns.text: -- you know She just - roughing it for me is going to the Holiday Inn and getting shower
You know But you know she has lot of fun
And mostly it is just way to - she she goes to dog shows
See she shows dogs and uh you can sneak dog into motel --
turns.label: sd

turns.text: -- but you cant sneak ten dogs into motel
turns.label: sd

turns.text: So she uh you know takes the motor home And she made deal with my dad that she would take all the dogs with her when she went dog showing
turns.label: sd

turns.text: And she - if he would buy her motor home
But as far as camping my wife and I have plans to uh not really camp per se but to drive up the uh you know Highway One there in California --
turns.label: sd

turns.text: -- uh as soon as we get this house finished
I am going to need vacation
turns.label: sd

turns.text: That will be pretty Thats really pretty out there There are lot of nice places
